definition: surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: Thanks to demonization of Hinduism by British lootersand their evangelists.
sentences.chinese: 感謝英國掠奪者及其佈道者對印度教的妖魔化。

sentences.english: The 1961 law forbidding dowries further undermined traditional Hinduism.
sentences.chinese: 1961年，法律更進一步地破壞印度教傳統的嫁妝。

sentences.english: This concept is one of the fundamental doctrines in Buddhism and Hinduism.
sentences.chinese: 這一概念是佛教和印度教最基本的教義之一。

sentences.english: The hindu phallic symbol of siva .
sentences.chinese: 印度教中溼婆的生殖器的象徵。
印度教和穆斯林的關係不錯。

sentences.english: From whom is the Hindu Nationalists hiding this report?
sentences.chinese: 印度教民族主義者掩着這報告防誰呢？

sentences.english: Kama is also the name of the Hindu Goddess of love.
sentences.chinese: 卡馬也是印度教女神的愛的名稱。

sentences.english: Many think India is an all-Hindu country, but it’s not.
sentences.chinese: 許多人認爲印度人都是印度教教徒，但其實不然。

sentences.english: Hindus are taught that “truth is one, the sages give it various names.”
sentences.chinese: 印度教訓示“真理唯一，哲人以不同名字稱謂之。”

sentences.english: Hinduism is the official religion of the country.
sentences.chinese: 印度教是這個國家的官方宗教。

sentences.english: In India, the beef and leather prodution are prohibited.
sentences.chinese: 印度教忌食牛肉和使用牛皮製品。

sentences.english: In Hinduism, Kurma was the second avatar of Vishnu.
sentences.chinese: 在印度教，烏寵庫爾瑪是毗瑟奴的第二個化身。

sentences.english: Festivalgoers leave offerings for the Hindu deity Lord Shiva.
sentences.chinese: 節日活動留下了給印度教溼婆神的供品。

sentences.english: The triad of divinities of later hinduism.
sentences.chinese: 後來印度教的三神一體。

sentences.english: Part of the reason for this is the influence of Hinduism.
sentences.chinese: 部分的由於這是印度教的影響的原因。

sentences.english: Heaven and hell aren't ideas I've heard discussed very much in Hinduism.
sentences.chinese: 我不常聽印度教討論天堂地獄的觀念。

pinyin: Suo3 luo2 ya4 si1 de2 jiao4
